inclusion.criterion: Placement of an IBT within the last 2 hours with plans for it to remain in situ for at least 2 hours
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Primary obstetrician amenable to proceeding with either method of management during the study period.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: IBT removed within 2 hours of placement
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Insufficient documentation of demographics, delivery outcomes, or peripartum events including postpartum hemorrhage, infectious outcomes
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: The patient is a 34-year-old obese woman who comes to the clinic with weight concerns. She has sleep apnea and PCO.
